formatDescription: Microsoft Help Contents Files store topics for a corresponding help document, which has file extension .hlp. They are found within applications which use Microsoft Help.
provenanceCompoundName: The Canadian Centre for Architecture / The Canadian Centre for Architecture

internalSignatures.name: Microsoft Help Contents File
internalSignatures.note: BOF Absolute from beginning of file, magic bytes: :Base{1-259}.(hlp/HLP)
